title: One Night Stand
description: What do you do when a one-night stand turns into something you never expected?Allen wants more time with her, while Jessica is looking for some hanky-panky in the dark.Will this one-night stand become more than what it's supposed to be? Will Jessica let her mind rule over her heart?This book is intended for an 18+ audience. It contains strong sexual language and explicit scenes. If you're looking for a quick, panty-melting read, then this story is just for you!This is Book 1 of 3. Book 2 will follow shortly after. However, no release date has been decided as of yet.
author: Lola Clarke
